author: valor (Valor_bound)
name: cmdRedirect
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
short: removes commands unless in specific channels!
description: A cog that removes commands unless in specific channels or set to be ignored!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
